document_data.mainbody: '''Blue Sword''' was a title within the government of [[Archendale]], one of the three anonymous [[Swords of Archendale]]. The Blue Sword was the battle-mage of the [[Archenriders]].
document_data.Identity: In the [[Year of the Gauntlet]], [[1369]] [[DR]], the Blue Sword was [[Alduvar Snowbrand]], a veteran [[mage]] of the army. In his public life, Alduvar was the proprietor of [[Jandalar's Fine Fruits]], a trading coster representing Archendale's vast produce and orchard exports. Like all the Swords, he protected his identity with a number of [[illusion]] spells and a pair of ''[[bracers of misdirection]]''.
